awsRegion.description:
The AWS region for template deployment

> **Note**
> - The default region is based on your Trend Vision One region.
> - Some features and permissions have limited support for some AWS regions. For more information, see https://docs.trendmicro.com/en-us/enterprise/trend-micro-xdr-help/CAMSupportedRegions

regions.description:
The regions where features are deployed.

Default: All regions that Cloud Account Management supports, depending on how the feature stack filters the regions.

features.description: The list of features you selected and the corresponding regions for deployment.

templateAccountType.description: The type of template generation for a single account scope or organization scope

awsAccountName.description: The cloud account name assigned to the created account

awsAccountDescription.description: The cloud account description assigned to the created account

name.description:
The name of the associated security service.

This value refers to specific security services connected to the system.

Available values:
* `workload` - Server & Workload Protection

instanceIds.description: The instance ID of the associated security service.

connectedSecurityServices.description: The security service associated with the connected AWS account.

customTags.description: The custom tags attached to the resources created by Trend Vision One

key.description: The key of the custom tag

value.description: The value of the custom tag
